We gratefully acknowledge the Stanford Woods Institute for the Environment for their support. Author contributions: D.R. and S.M.G. conceptualized the study, analyzed the results, and wrote the manuscript. D.R. performed the rainfall bias corrections, hydrologic simulations, and statistical analyses of droughts. Competing interests: The authors declare that they have no competing interests. Data and materials availability: All data needed to evaluate the conclusions in the paper are present in the paper and/or the Supplementary Materials. Additional data related to this paper may be requested from S.M.G. ( gorelick@stanford.edu).
